login.tos: By signing up, you agree to our Terms of Service and our very strict Privacy Policy
login.header:
Hello and welcome to
the world of secure messaging!

messages.loginSuccess: Success! We'll log you in securely now...
messages.ambiguousProcess: This username exists. You can choose to continue login or register a unique name.
messages.incorrectPassword: Your password is incorrect. Please try again.
messages.registerMessage: This username is free. You can continue to choose a secure password...
messages.registerSuccess: Welcome on board! We'll log you in now...
messages.invalidUsername: A-Z a-z 0-9 are allowed for usernames. Special characters and spaces are not.
messages.passwordTooShort: Your password is too short. We require a minimum of 8 characters

settings.title: Settings
settings.pushAlert: This feature is not ready yet but we are working on it, promise!
settings.logoutWarning: Do you want to log out from your account on this device?

profile.idExplanation: This is your personal and unique ID on whispeer. You need this to verify with friendsâ€”for extra security! They scan your ID, you scan their ID and both of you have easily increased your security measures. Cool, huh?

contacts.acceptRequestQuestion: Do you want to add this person as a contact?
contacts.sendRequestQuestion: Do you want to send a contact request to this person?
contacts.removeQuestion: Are you sure that you want to remove this Contact?
contacts.requestSentMessage: You've sent a contact request to {{name}}.

image.removeQuestion: Are you sure that you want to remove your Picture?

sales.title: Hey! It seems like you aren't a business user yet...
sales.text: whispeer brings the most secure way of encrypted communication to the professional world - for you and your comapny. Try it now!
sales.privateUser: Not a business user? Switch to private
